title: iPad 2020 review: here we go again, again
description: Apple's 8th-gen iPad for 2020 continues to be one of the best deals in tech: a stupendous tablet for less than $500. But there are things that grate: the lack of multi user, the low base storage, and no USB-C. In this review, Dieter Bohn looks at the very good and increasingly annoying aspects of the new iPad.
